title: Dzik
author: Dzik
content: Dear community, my name Dmitry Khodarenok and I want to introduce our project - VIPWarz:https://warz.vip/assets/banner.pngWe are GameFi/NFT project - a Very Important Pets(VIP) fighting for hype in a virtual social networks(Petztagram, Petzter, etc). You can buy NFT card, grow it and resell.We are launched on Callisto Network and will expand to more chains in August-September.Main concepts:-NFTs :3 types of NFT card(VIP Legendary, VIP Standard, BlogPetz), different game characteristics, sale/mint price(starting as low as $4 for BlogPetz), farming income-Gaming: play and get XP, improve your card.¬† 1 vs 1 game, Clan vs Clan, Everybody against everybody types of game, different arenas(Petztagram, Petzbook, Petzter, etc) and many other. Improvement inventory coming 1st October. And many more features.-VVT Token - we launched ICO on 30 June and it will last till 30 December. Start token price $0.1, price increasing 1% every week.We have confirmed listing on soy.finance DEX on 1st October, in discussion with other DEX/CEX now. After 30 December VVT token will be main game token - you can buy XP, inventory, create paid games using token.-Farming - after end of ICO we will activate farming feature. All owners of NFTs who put it into gaming contract will receive VVT token. Estimated APRs 20%-100% for different NFT types.More info available in our whitepaper.-DAO dev fund - After end of ICO we will establish community controlled fund that will be used to grow our metaverse using core dev team or any 3rd party devs.I am ready to answer any questions here or in our TG/Discord groups.Links:Site: https://warz.vipWhitepaper: https://vipwarz.gitbook.io/whitepaper/TG: https://t.me/VipWarzTwitter: https://twitter.com/VipWarzDiscord: https://discord.gg/hK5y3NPd

comments.author: Dzik
comments.body: Hey, we are discussing bounty campaign on bitcointalk, would you be interested?Also any feedback about our project will be appreciated¬† - what you like or don't like in our project.

comments.author: Dzik
comments.body: Woof! Silence here and I am talking with myself. So today I want to tell about referral campaign:https://warz.vip/#/registerrefYou can register as referral and we pay 10% of each BlogPetz mint by your referral link. Current BlogPetz price 1622 CLO and remember that it's increasing with each mint.Ping me here or in our channels in case you need any assistance.

comments.author: Dzik
comments.body: Dear community,It's day 4 of newbi trying to break BitcoinTalk silence¬† , let's talk about security today:We all know that there are a bunch of small and big smart contracts hacked everyday. Really it's a challenge for developer to create solid, secure contract - you can't easy update code,you need to proof/share your code, you have many limitations -¬† so everybody can test/debug and try to hack your smart contract. That's why smart contract code audit is so important.We all know about Certik, Hacken and many other agencies who provide smart contracts audits. We chose Callisto Network and it's Audit department and here is why:-They Audited 350+ smart contracts, which is more than the top 5 audit companies. -Callisto founded by Dexaran - ex ETH, ex ETC core developer and auditor of many contracts on ETC chains. -Callisto and Dexaran invented the ERC223 token standard - more secure than ERC20 - simple changes that save millions. And here is our smart contracts audit report:https://callisto.network/vipwarz-v2-security-audit-report/Woof!

comments.author: Dzik
comments.body: Day 5 and I hope somebody except moderators read me. Today I want to tell you about our cards and it's benefits:Legendary NFT cards:52 unique hand drawn NFT cards will be minted. Legendary NFT cards have 1.3 coefficient for XP calculations after battles, 1% paid to game bank for paid battles reward, inventory trades, 51.3% of annual emission VVT tokens distributed yearly to legendary cards farmers.Standard NFT cards:270 unique hand drawn NFT cards will be minted. Standard NFT cards have 1.0 coefficient for XP calculations, 5% paid to game bank for paid battles rewards, inventory trades. 37.3% of annual emission VVT tokens distributed yearly to standard card farmers.BlogPetz cards:Maximum 10 000 BlogPetz cards can be minted. BlogPetz NFT have coefficient 0.5 for XP calculations, 10% paid to the game bank for paid battles rewards, inventory trades. 9.7% of annual emission VVT tokens distributed yearly to BlogPetz farmers. BlogPetz will be minted by users, by selecting BlogPetz DNA out of 100 000 variants.BundlesBundles are combination of special VIP Legendary card + 5 VIP Standard cards. They give additional benefits to it's owners:1.7% of annual emission will be given to Bundle owners additionally to Legendary/Standard farming incomeStress of all bundle cards halved if they all put into gaming contractI am still in newbie status, so pictures available in our communities and on site

comments.author: nira09
comments.body: Now there are so many tokens for GAMEFI & NFT, What makes your project interesting and different from previous projects, So it will prefer you over others.Your thread looks less attractive, you need to fix it immediately. You can hire someone professional to create a new, better thread, Or you can become a cooper member so that you can upload images.

comments.author: Dzik
comments.body: It‚Äôs really hard to invent something new in NFT/gaming, so we decided to focus on quality, trust and creative:- we combined¬† all best NFT/GameFi ideas and building it with top quality- community trust very important for us, we are building 100% organic community - creative idea - I think we found a great idea and implementing it with fun and great graphics - we want to make our project decentralized, that‚Äôs why we established DAO dev fund and want to attract different teams/projects to our metaverse Thread attraction- ok noted, I‚Äôll update it this week

comments.author: Dzik
comments.body: Long time no posts here, but we did a good job during this time. All updates in our TG. And we just expanded to Binance Smart Chain and we launched trading competitionsVIPWarz presents VVT trading competition on pancakeswap.finance with more than $2000 worth of prizes‚≠êÔ∏è Rules:‚úîÔ∏è Subscribe to our Twitter account: https://twitter.com/VipWarz‚úîÔ∏è Like and retweet this announcement ‚úîÔ∏è Subscribe to our TG channel : https://t.me/VipWarz‚úîÔ∏è Trade VVT token on pancakeswap.finance 29 March 15.00 UTC - 29 April 15.00 UTC‚≠êÔ∏è Prizes:Biggest trading volume competition:ü•á1st place: #59 NOVAK DOGOVICH VIP card + 50K VVT tokensü•à2nd place: 10 BlogPetz cards + 25K VVT tokensü•â3d place: 10K VVT tokensBiggest number of transactions competition:ü•á1st place: #19 DOGERT WOOFOWSKI VIP card + 50K VVT tokensü•à2nd place: 10 BlogPetz cards + 25K VVT tokensü•â3d place: 10K VVT tokensüíé Results will be verified and published on 7 May 2023 üíé

comments.author: Dzik
comments.body: Dear VIPWarz Community,We are happy to announce partnership with NULS chain, https://nuls.io:-VVT token available at Nerve bridge (https://bridge.nerve.network/). You can transfer VVT between BSC, NULS, ENULS, Nerve chains-We are part of NULS SCO program, you can stake NULS and earn VVT: https://pocm.nuls.io/pocm/Projects/ProjectsInfo?releaseId=430-We are coming to NULS DEXes soon, more news and competitions with prizes to follow-NFT bridge for VIP & BlogPetz cards coming 1st June. More details coming soon.2023 is an expansion year for VIPWarz and NULS our first partner, more partners will be announced soon, so stay tuned.
